job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Hospital & Health Care
job.description:
Software Engineer

100% Remote

6 month contract-to-hire

Fortune 500 Health Client

Position Overview:

Team member will work on a team of truly talented individuals and be responsible for design, build and testing (using automation scripts but not limited to unit/integration/performance testing) of Product Enrollment Suite. This team is responsible for 5 systems all having to do with product. You will be working with homegrown systems and client systems. The candidate will be responsible for buildingcomponents of theProduct Enrollment Suite with a range of cutting edge technologies that interface with various enterprise systems.

Key Technologies Needed:

  • Angular
  • Nodejs/Typescript
  • Python
  • Deployment/containerization tools (Kubernetes/docker/jenkins/etc.)

Required Experience/ Qualifications:

·Solid Analytical skills

·Familiar withMicro-services Architecture and Rest patterns using leading industry recommended security frameworks

·Experience in Data Integration (batch, real-time) following Enterprise Integration Patterns

·Highly motivated, well-rounded, team player and self-starter that works best in a collaborative, dynamic, agile environment

Desired Experience / Qualifications:

·Experience in Cloud and related technologies such as AWS, Google, Azure

·SAFe Agile experience, with any SAFe certifications a plus

·Knowledge of reporting/BI tools such as Cognos would be plus

·Quick learner of new technologies and adapt to changes

·Excellent communication skills
